title: Drawing, "House with a Lawn freshly Seeded", ca. 1940
medium: Pen and black ink, brush and Chinese white on paper
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and black ink, sign: Seeds Keep Off; other sign: You will get Spanked.
description: Square brick house with white door at the end of a long path. Freshly seeded lawn with fence around it. Two signs on either side.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "House with a Lawn freshly Seeded", ca. 1940.
ca. 1940. Pen and black ink, brush and Chinese white on paper. Gift of Christina Malman. 1947-110-10.
